page.title: 14EDUCATION: MARKET WESTON
page.content: To our small communities the village schools are most important. In l96l Market Weston was closed & the children now go to Hopton Primary & then onto Stanton Middle & Thurston Upper school. Market Weston being 1.5 miles from Hop- ton school does not qualify for school transport so children are usually taken by parents in cars or walk.The meeting of mothers & parents,through the child- ren contirbutes greatly to social con- tact between villages. When the child- ren transfer to the middle & upper schools they are transported by coaches contracted by the County Council & the parents loose this daily contact with each other. It is generally felt that when a village school is closed the whole community suffers.
